name: Shexyo Style LoRA
description:
This is a micro-LoRA to recreate the style of Shexyo. An artist who was heavily inspired by Robutts.

  • I suggest using this LoRA at 0.7-1.1 weight for best results.

  • This LoRA was trained on 500 pictures sfw and (mainly) nsfw with NAI. All examples images were generated on AbyssOrangeMix3_A1 and OrangeMix VAE.

  • This was a request in one of the comments on another LoRA.

  • I also realized as I uploaded the last preview picture that in the prompt it says 'beat quality' instead of best quality.

All pictures were upscaled using these settings:

  • ESRGAN4x

  • Hires. Steps: 5

  • Denoising Strength: 0.05

  • Upscale by 1.5 (768x768)

Embeds and LoRAs used in prompts: Bad Prompt

Be sure to leave a review, comment and check out my other LoRAs - You might see something you like here.

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune

meta.prompt: beautiful, beat quality, extremely detailed face, perfect lighting, 1girl, solo, shexyo,  <lora:Shexyo:0.9>,  dark skin, dark-skinned female, very long hair, bangs, red eyes, smile, evil, grin, dress, black dress, wings
meta.negativePrompt: (low quality, worst quality:1.4), (bad_prompt:0.8), (monochrome:1.1), watermark, signature, patreon username, patreon logo, web address
